name: Pest Control (itch) (RSalam, NeonBlues, Shadowrabbit, dreammchine64)
description:
Things to note! Controls are: WASD to walk, mouse to look, left click to SHOOT, right click to ALT FIRE, Press Tab during the build phase to open the shop. 

The blue bar at the top of the screen is the core's health that you are defending, the blue bar in the top left is your health. The first ability is Blackhole which sucks in enemies with Q and the second is Portals, these can be instantly placed using E. When you purchase new weapons and traps in the store, you can select your new items by scrolling the mouse wheel. The remaining amount of enemies in a wave is shown in the top right of the screen. Weapons have a heat gauge that is indicated by the crosshair gradually turning red. Abilities also have a cooldown represented by their respective icons in the bottom left corner of the screen. The diamond under the player's health is your money that you earn by killing aliens.

NEW!! Gamepad Controls! Left stick to walk, right stick to aim, right trigger to shoot, left trigger to ALT FIRE, left bumper is blackhole, right bumper is portal, A is jump and D-Pad Right/D-Pad Left is weapon swap, Select is Shop and Start is Pause menu.
